page.title: 05Bradley's Local Vicar
page.content: Our local vicar has wavy grey hair and wears spectacles.His face is a bit wrinkled.When we went to see him he was wearing a clerical collar,a grey suit and black shoes.He is kind and truthful and works hard.When he is giving out books to the children at Sunday School he wears a purple cloak with a gold cross.He is in charge of three churches,he is Priest in Charge of Bradley,The Rector of Church Eaton and the Vicar of Moreton.On a Saturday morning he goes to the prison.When someone rings up his wife she is always pleased to say that he is in prison and they wonder what he has done.He goes to prison to see the people who are ill or in trouble.On Friday he takes his wife shopping.Sometimes he works in the garden.He takes wedding,funeral and christening services,weekly services and visits people in their homes.
